title: TeaHaus
description: Ayurveda is India's traditional, natural system of medicine that has been practiced for more than 5,000 years. A Sanskrit word, Ayurveda translates as "science of life" or "practices of longevity." Our Ayurvedic teas have been blended to complement the three doshas: Kapha, Pitta, and Vata.
